11 using namespace voxblox; // NOLINT

13 class TsdfMergeIntegratorTest : public ::testing::Test {
14  protected:
15  virtual void SetUp() {
16  tsdf_voxels_per_side_ = 10u;
17  tsdf_voxel_size_ = 1.0f;
18  compare_tol_ = 0.0000001f;
19  }
20 
21  size_t tsdf_voxels_per_side_;
22  float tsdf_voxel_size_;
23  float compare_tol_;
24 
25  void setBlockSameValues(const float distance,
26  Block<TsdfVoxel>::Ptr block_ptr) {
27  // Looping and setting all voxels
28  for (size_t x_idx = 0; x_idx < tsdf_voxels_per_side_; x_idx++) {
29  for (size_t y_idx = 0; y_idx < tsdf_voxels_per_side_; y_idx++) {
30  for (size_t z_idx = 0; z_idx < tsdf_voxels_per_side_; z_idx++) {
31  // Creating the point
32  VoxelIndex index(x_idx, y_idx, z_idx);
33  TsdfVoxel& voxel_ref = block_ptr->getVoxelByVoxelIndex(index);
34  // Setting voxel
35  voxel_ref.distance = distance;
36  voxel_ref.weight = 1.0;
37  }
38  }
39  }
40  // Setting has data flag
41  block_ptr->has_data() = true;
42  }
43 };
44 
45 TEST_F(TsdfMergeIntegratorTest, WithinBlock) {
46  // New layer
47  Layer<TsdfVoxel> tsdf_layer(tsdf_voxel_size_,
48  tsdf_voxels_per_side_);
49 
50  // Allocating the block;
51  Point origin(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
52  Block<TsdfVoxel>::Ptr block_ptr =
53  tsdf_layer.allocateBlockPtrByCoordinates(origin);
54 
55  // This is a block where the distance of each voxel indicates height
56  for (float x = 0.5; x < tsdf_voxels_per_side_; x++) {
57  for (float y = 0.5; y < tsdf_voxels_per_side_; y++) {
58  for (float z = 0.5; z < tsdf_voxels_per_side_; z++) {
59  // Creating the point
60  Point point(x, y, z);
61  // Getting a voxel
62  TsdfVoxel& voxel_ref = block_ptr->getVoxelByCoordinates(point);
63  // Setting voxel
64  voxel_ref.distance = z;
65  voxel_ref.weight = 1.0;
66  block_ptr->has_data() = true;
67  }
68  }
69  }
70 
71  // Creating the interpolator
72  Interpolator<TsdfVoxel> interpolator(&tsdf_layer);
73 
74  // A test output voxel
75  TsdfVoxel voxel;
76 
77  // Interpolating below the block
78  Point point_out_1(1.0, 1.0, 0.1);
79  Point point_out_2(1.0, 1.0, 0.4);
80  // Expecting this to not work
81  EXPECT_FALSE(interpolator.getVoxel(point_out_1, &voxel, true));
82  EXPECT_FALSE(interpolator.getVoxel(point_out_2, &voxel, true));
83 
84  // Interpolating within the block
85  bool failed_to_interpolate = false;
86  bool wrong_answer = false;
87  for (float x = 1.0; x < tsdf_voxels_per_side_ - 0.5; x = x + 0.1) {
88  for (float y = 1.0; y < tsdf_voxels_per_side_ - 0.5; y = y + 0.1) {
89  for (float z = 1.0; z < tsdf_voxels_per_side_ - 0.5; z = z + 0.1) {
90  // The point to interpolate at
91  Point point(x, y, z);
92  // Interpolating at this point
93  if (interpolator.getVoxel(point, &voxel, true)) {
94  if (fabs(voxel.distance - z) > compare_tol_) {
95  wrong_answer = true;
96  }
97  } else {
98  failed_to_interpolate = true;
99  }
100  }
101  }
102  }
103  // Testing the results
104  EXPECT_FALSE(wrong_answer);
105  EXPECT_FALSE(failed_to_interpolate);
106 }
107 
108 TEST_F(TsdfMergeIntegratorTest, BetweenBlocks) {
109  // New layer
110  Layer<TsdfVoxel> tsdf_layer(tsdf_voxel_size_,
111  tsdf_voxels_per_side_);
112 
113  // Allocating some blocks (in a sort of 3D plus pattern)
114  Block<TsdfVoxel>::Ptr block_ptr_0 =
115  tsdf_layer.allocateBlockPtrByCoordinates(Point(0.0, 0.0, 0.0));
116  Block<TsdfVoxel>::Ptr block_ptr_x_p1 =
117  tsdf_layer.allocateBlockPtrByCoordinates(
118  Point(tsdf_voxels_per_side_, 0.0, 0.0));
119  Block<TsdfVoxel>::Ptr block_ptr_x_n1 =
120  tsdf_layer.allocateBlockPtrByCoordinates(
121  Point(-tsdf_voxel_size_, 0.0, 0.0));
122  Block<TsdfVoxel>::Ptr block_ptr_y_p1 =
123  tsdf_layer.allocateBlockPtrByCoordinates(
124  Point(0.0, tsdf_voxels_per_side_, 0.0));
125  Block<TsdfVoxel>::Ptr block_ptr_y_n1 =
126  tsdf_layer.allocateBlockPtrByCoordinates(
127  Point(0.0, -tsdf_voxel_size_, 0.0));
128  Block<TsdfVoxel>::Ptr block_ptr_z_p1 =
129  tsdf_layer.allocateBlockPtrByCoordinates(
130  Point(0.0, 0.0, tsdf_voxels_per_side_));
131  Block<TsdfVoxel>::Ptr block_ptr_z_n1 =
132  tsdf_layer.allocateBlockPtrByCoordinates(
133  Point(0.0, 0.0, -tsdf_voxel_size_));
134 
135  // Assigning the blocks some values
136  setBlockSameValues(0.0, block_ptr_0);
137  setBlockSameValues(1.0, block_ptr_x_p1);
138  setBlockSameValues(-1.0, block_ptr_x_n1);
139  setBlockSameValues(1.0, block_ptr_y_p1);
140  setBlockSameValues(-1.0, block_ptr_y_n1);
141  setBlockSameValues(1.0, block_ptr_z_p1);
142  setBlockSameValues(-1.0, block_ptr_z_n1);
143 
144  // Interpolating some bullshit
145  Interpolator<TsdfVoxel> interpolator(&tsdf_layer);
146 
147  // Points to interpolate (below origin block)
148  AlignedVector<Point> points_below;
149  points_below.push_back(Point(1.0, 1.0, 0.5));
150  points_below.push_back(Point(1.0, 1.0, 0.25));
151  points_below.push_back(Point(1.0, 1.0, 0.0));
152  points_below.push_back(Point(1.0, 1.0, -0.25));
153  points_below.push_back(Point(1.0, 1.0, -0.5));
154 
155  // Expected answers (hand calculated)
156  float expected_answers_below[5] = {0, -0.25, -0.5, -0.75, -1.0};
157 
158  // Looping and testing
159  TsdfVoxel voxel;
160  for (size_t point_index = 0; point_index < points_below.size();
161  point_index++) {
162  // Getting the interpolated point
163  Point point = points_below[point_index];
164  interpolator.getVoxel(point, &voxel, true);
165  // Testing
166  EXPECT_NEAR(voxel.distance, expected_answers_below[point_index], compare_tol_);
167  }
168 }
169 
170 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
171  ::testing::InitGoogleTest(&argc, argv);
172  google::InitGoogleLogging(argv[0]);
173 
174  int result = RUN_ALL_TESTS();
175 
176  return result;
177 }
